mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( MEMBERID, MEMBERPW, MEMBERNAME, MEMBERBIRTHDAY, MEMBERPHONE, MEMBERADDR, JOINDAY, LIBCODE, MEMBERPAYMENTSTATUS ) VALUES ( #{MEMBER_ID}, #{MEMBER_PW}, #{MEMBER_NAME}, #{MEMBER_BIRTHDAY}, #{MEMBER_PHONE}, #{MEMBER_ADDR}, #{JOIN_DAY}, #{LIB_CODE}, #{MEMBER_PAYMENTSTATUS} );
mapper.select: select MEMBERID MEMBERNAME MEMBERBIRTHDAY MEMBERPHONE MEMBERADDR JOINDAY from member
mapper.insert: insert into books ( LIBCODE, BOOKNAME, WRITER, PUBLISHER, CATEGORY, GENRE, BOOKLOCATION, CURRENTSTATUS ) values ( #{LIB_CODE}, #{BOOK_NAME}, #{BOOK_WRITER}, #{BOOK_PUBLISHER}, #{BOOK_CATEGORY}, #{BOOK_GENRE}, #{BOOK_LOCATION}, #{BOOK_CURRENTSTATUS} );
